name: GALAXY TOP WING
description: This is an independent development of casual games, is the experience of virtual reality space shooting game. The player flying in the universe and sitting in the cockpit and observing the magnificent cosmic scenes outside the  fighter by the VR, through the meteorite zones, the jumping doors, the debris of the spacecraft and other scenes, chasing and shooting with the enemy fighters in space with their teammates and attacking the enemy's spaceship. Follow up plans also develop planetary exploration, Galaxy roaming, and spaceship wars. Control the direction of the fighter through the mouse in the game,' W' key to speed forward, 'S' key to slow down, 'A' key to the left roll, 'D' key roll to the right, 'ESC' key suspension game, 'space' key resume game, the left mouse button shooting, the right mouse button to change the weapon.
